snippet: The Ethics Committee announced that it had named a special panel to determine whether Representative Trey Radel, Republican of Florida, broke House ethics rules as a result of his drug habit.
lead_paragraph: The Ethics Committee announced that it had named a special panel to determine whether Representative Trey Radel, Republican of Florida, broke House ethics rules as a result of his drug habit.

headline.main: House Opens Inquiry After Republican’s Cocaine Conviction
